testcase.system-out: Given the user launches the automationexercise site.........................passed When the user clicks the home page option in the navbar.....................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed When the user clicks on the Signup / Login button...........................passed Then to Validate the ‘New User Sign up’ message is visible..................passed Then Validate that the email field in the signup only accepts correct format emails.passed And Type in "name" and "email" on the Sign up Form..........................passed And the user clicks on the Sign up button...................................passed Then to validate the ‘ENTER ACCOUNT INFORMATION’ Message is visible.........passed Then Fill the details for the registration form.............................passed And Validate the account created message being visible......................passed And Validate the -Logged in as username- being visible......................passed Then the user clicks on the button log out..................................passed And Validate the Login to your account message is visible...................passed Then Validate with incorrect data, that the login will not pass without correct email and password.passed And Validate that the email field in the login page has to have format AtDomaindotcom.passed And enter the email and password user before to log in......................passed Then click on the Login button..............................................passed And validate that Logged in as username is visible..........................passed Then Click on the Delete account button.....................................passed And Validate that ACCOUNT DELETED message is visible........................failed
